attributes.action: Move all HE teaching in the U.K. online-only by default, and support students.
attributes.additional_details:
As evidenced, HE opening for "business as usual" is dangerous and deadly. U.S. colleges have 88,000 COVID-19 cases (NYT, 2020), and Scotland is"locking down" students with outbreaks in Glasgow/Edinburgh (BBC, 2020). 

Lives of staff and students are at risk with teaching in person. Classes should be online-only. Students should have accommodation fees refunded. If required (e.g. for practicals) campuses would be safer if other classes were online and community residents would also be safer.
attributes.background: In line with rising COVID-19 infection rates in the United Kingdom, this petition calls for the U.K. Government to immediately announce that all Universities must shift their teaching to online-only by default immediately, cancel students' accommodation and rental contracts, and refund these fees.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
